html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01522024-02-19ISED, NRC
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving the ENTRY by National Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada that covers all employees in the Research Officers and Research Council Officers Group bargaining unit for the period beginning on July 20, 2022 and ending on July 19, 2026.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the ENTRY by National Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada that covers all employees in the Research Officers and Research Council Officers Group bargaining unit for the period beginning on July 20, 2022 and ending on July 19, 2026.
